title: Brooch, ca. 1909
markings: On underside; Marks : C.H in rectangular punch, Chester, script J for 1909 or S? for 1918
provenance: 2013, Given to Cooper-Hewitt by owner Harry C. Sigman.
description: Round brooch with three protruding knobs surrounding a triangular silver band surrounding a cut purple stone in the center.

tombstone.epitaph: Brooch, ca. 1909.Silver, cut purple stone. Gift of Harry C. Sigman. 2013-21-25.
